data.name: Midnight Stories 2 - DLC 2 - The Beach Party
data.detailed_description:
This DLC will continue the adventure of Cindy and Michelle. The content has full audio and text is narrated by either Cindy or Michelle. Dialogs are included in the narration and they dynamically adapt accordingly.
Sounds and effects have been added.
Renders are in 4k and there are approx. 160 images.
Also, achievements have been created.

The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form (fist fight, knife or gun combat) or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

data.short_description: This DLC - The Beach Party - will continue the adventure of Cindy and Michelle. The content has full audio and sound effects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
